name: color-palette-manager
title: Color Palette Manager
description: Color Palette Manager allows you to manage your collection of color palettes directly in Raycast. Create and save your favorite palettes, edit, duplicate, delete, or merge them with ease. Interact with the Color Picker extension to quickly add new colors or generate palettes, and use AI-powered tools to create new color combinations or generate shades based on any color.
author: elibattistoni

commands.name: save-color-palette
commands.title: Save Color Palette
commands.subtitle: Create and save a color palette
commands.description: Save Color Palette allows you to save a color palette to the Raycast's Local Storage.

commands.name: manage-color-palettes
commands.title: Manage Color Palettes
commands.subtitle: View and manage your saved color palettes
commands.description: Manage Color Palettes allows you to view all your saved color palettes, and edit, duplicate, delete and merge them.

commands.name: create-colors-with-ai
commands.title: Create Colors with AI
commands.subtitle: Create a set of colors based on a prompt
commands.description: Create Colors with AI allows you to create a set of colors that you can then save as color palette

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
